description: As they have in the past, the NFL and Nike are teaming up for another season, releasing new colorways and designs from their Air Pegasus 41 collaboration.
content:
Based on facts, either observed and verified firsthand by the reporter, or reported and verified from knowledgeable sources.

As they have in the past, the NFL and Nike are teaming up for another season, releasing new colorways and designs from their Air Pegasus 41 collaboration.

The 2025-26 NFL season is set to kick off tonight with an exciting divisional matchup between the Cowboys and the Eagles. Hopes are sky high across the league, as it is still anyone's guess who the surprise teams in the NFL might be this season.

Nike is ensuring fans are ready for the season with another release of the highly popular Nike Pegasus 41, this time in collaboration with the NFL. This is not the first time we have seen a release like this, and on the first occasion, many of the colorways and shoes from different teams sold out.

This drop features new colorways not available the first time around, and also allows fans to pick from their favorite teams that might have sold out last year.

The Pegasus 41 model is one of the most comfortable, practical, and stylish shoes on the market, all at the same time. Adding a Steelers logo and team colors to the design makes for the perfect combination.

Click on any of the images or links to check out the entire collection and place your order now. Fanatics has you covered with officially licensed Pittsburgh Steelers NFL Nike Pegasus 41 sneakers.

If you purchase a product or register for an account through one of the links on our site, we may receive compensation.
